channel.title: Hunter skill
channel.description:
Now, we know what you're thinking: “What on RuneScape can I do with all that new bank space?” Well, how about we release lots of new equipment and objects for you to store, and perhaps even use with a shiny new skill? Yes, towards the end of the month we will be releasing the Hunter skill.
MODIFY: Hunter skill, do you think it will be irritating (couse about a 900 000 people can't use it) or not?

item.title: Hunter skill
item.dc:creator: @blacker blacker
item.description:
@blacker wrote:

Original Daniel:

I doubt it will have a bug like the fally massacre, theres been 1 huge bug in classic (duping) and in rs2. Jagex isn’t gonna let it happen again.

Oh, yes, the fally massacre, good times, good times.

Read full topic

item.title: Hunter skill
item.dc:creator: @Lele Lele
item.description:
@Lele wrote:

They have made irratating skills in the past. As for

  1. farming
  2. construction (costs way too much)

And some quests like chompy hunting.

Read full topic

item.title: Hunter skill
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

Jagex is a company. Its purpose it to make money. If they release more updates for f2p then they will lose money.

I doubt it will have a bug like the fally massacre, theres been 1 huge bug in classic (duping) and in rs2. Jagex isn’t gonna let it happen again.

It won’t be like slayer, if it was then jagex wouldn’t bother with a new skill, they would just build onto slayer.

And to the moron telling everyone how bad hunting will be, it hasn’t even been released yet so what the fuck would you know?

Read full topic

item.title: Hunter skill
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“O M F G, post:25, topic:21287”]:mad:JAGEX :mad:!!! :mad:you :mad:BASTARDS :mad:!!! :mad:show some respect for non-members!!! :mad: :mad: :mad:
You won’t get members if ppl don’t like free(it’s their first impresion)
sides, they comepletely neglect em free players,wen was da last time they made an update exept holiday???JUNE!!!
I was member,and will be! yet still support f2p!!!Join the rebellion(I surely hope Jagex doesn’t c this, for the sake o us all, were violatin Copyright!, still I hope some likeness of this, with no insulting of Jagex or names mentioned will get to the sugestions forum multiple times!!!)[/quote]
It’s almost hard to explain just how foolish you are. If they added a new f2p skill, you still wouldn’t become a member. Your getting pissed at them, but you still play THEIR game.

Read full topic
